content.raw_text: New Annual Plan—Welcome & Receipt From: CuriosityStream <welcome@curiositystream.com> To: alex.lopez@example.com Date: Tue, 11 Mar 2025 14:02:18 -0400 Subject: 🎉 Welcome to CuriosityStream! Your Annual Plan Starts Now Message-ID: <20250311180218.8181.annual@curiositystream.com> Hi Alex, Thanks for joining the CuriosityStream community! Your Annual Plan is now active and ready to stream thousands of documentaries. ‣ Plan: HD Annual (12 months) ‣ Price: US $39.99 (plus applicable taxes) ‣ Payment method: Visa •••• 6932 ‣ Invoice #: CSTM-1357924680 You can log in any time at https://curiositystream.com to explore curated collections, download videos, and create watchlists. Need help? Just reply or visit our Help Center. —The CuriosityStream Team *This is an automatic email; replies are monitored Monday–Friday, 9 am–5 pm ET.*

Upcoming Renewal Reminder (30 days out) From: CuriosityStream <billing@curiositystream.com> To: katie.chen@example.net Date: Wed, 26 Feb 2025 08:15:04 -0500 Subject: Your CuriosityStream plan renews on 28 Mar 2025—no action needed Message-ID: <20250226131504.4411.renew@curiositystream.com> Hi Katie, Just a heads-up: your HD Monthly Plan will renew on 28 Mar 2025 for US $4.99 using Mastercard •••• 2480. If you’d like to update your payment info or cancel auto-renew, visit Account → Subscriptions before the renewal date. Happy streaming! Billing Operations CuriosityStream

Payment Success Confirmation From: CuriosityStream <receipts@curiositystream.com> To: david.owens@sample.org Date: Mon, 28 Apr 2025 03:02:47 +0000 Subject: Payment received—thank you for staying curious! Message-ID: <20250428030247.5522.receipt@curiositystream.com> Hello David, We’ve successfully processed your subscription payment. • Plan: 4K Monthly • Charge: US $9.99 • Date: 28 Apr 2025 • Order ID: CS-987654321 A PDF receipt is attached for your records. Enjoy the view in stunning 4K! —CuriosityStream Finance

Payment Failure & Retry Notice From: CuriosityStream <alerts@curiositystream.com> To: priya.r@example.co.in Date: Fri, 20 Jun 2025 07:22:03 +0530 Subject: Action required—We couldn’t process your last payment Message-ID: <20250620015203.6123.fail@curiositystream.com> Hi Priya, Your July renewal (US ₹499) didn’t go through because your bank declined the charge on card •••• 4510. We’ll retry automatically on 23 Jun 2025. To avoid interruption, update your payment details at https://curiositystream.com/billing. Questions? Reply to this message—our support team is here to help. Thanks for streaming with us. —CuriosityStream Billing Support

Upgrade Confirmation (HD → 4K) From: CuriosityStream <support@curiositystream.com> To: mark_h@domain.com Date: Sun, 15 Jun 2025 19:48:55 +0100 Subject: Your plan has been upgraded to 4K—enjoy the extra detail! Message-ID: <20250615184855.7999.upgrade@curiositystream.com> Hi Mark, Great choice! Your subscription now includes 4K streaming on compatible devices. New plan preview • 4K Annual—renews 15 Jun 2026 at US $69.99 • Pro-rated upgrade charge today: US $22.04 Start watching our Ultra HD titles like “Light On Earth” or “Secrets of the Solar System”. Cheers, The CuriosityStream Crew

Card Expiring Soon From: CuriosityStream <billing@curiositystream.com> To: jane.vo@example.com Date: Thu, 1 May 2025 00:07:09 -0700 Subject: Your card on file expires this month—update now to keep streaming Message-ID: <20250501070709.2266.card@curiositystream.com> Hello Jane, The Visa card ending 1923 on your account expires 31 May 2025. Add a new payment method before your next billing on 2 Jun 2025 to prevent service disruption. Update card → Account > Billing Thank you! CuriosityStream Billing

Cancellation Confirmation & Survey From: CuriosityStream <goodbye@curiositystream.com> To: tomas.ivanov@example.cz Date: Tue, 22 Apr 2025 10:30:11 +0200 Subject: We’re sorry to see you go, Tomáš Message-ID: <20250422083011.3177.cancel@curiositystream.com> Hi Tomáš, Your subscription has been canceled effective 22 Apr 2025. You’ll keep access until the end of your current billing period on 5 May 2025. We’d love to hear why you left—two-minute survey: https://curiositystream.com/exit-survey You’re always welcome back. All the best, CuriosityStream Team

Re-Join Offer (Win-back) From: CuriosityStream <offers@curiositystream.com> To: former.user@isp.eu Date: Tue, 27 May 2025 12:01:00 +0000 Subject: 40 % off if you return to CuriosityStream this week Message-ID: <20250527120100.4844.winback@curiositystream.com> Hello, We miss our favorite explorer! Restart your account by 3 Jun 2025 and get 40 % off your first year—just US $23.99. Redeem code: RETURN40 Questions? Chat live → https://curiositystream.com/help Happy watching, Marketing @ CuriosityStream

Gift Subscription Delivered From: CuriosityStream <gifts@curiositystream.com> To: kevin.doe@samplemail.com Date: Sun, 8 Dec 2024 06:45:33 -0500 Subject: 🎁 Your CuriosityStream gift for Sarah has been emailed Message-ID: <20241208114533.3636.gift@curiositystream.com> Hi Kevin, Your gift subscription has been sent to sarah.brown@samplemail.com with your personal note. Gift details • 12-month HD Plan • Delivery date/time: 8 Dec 2024 06:45 EST • Order #: CS-GFT-55667788 Thank you for sharing the joy of learning! —CuriosityStream Gifts Team

Refund Processed From: CuriosityStream <billing@curiositystream.com> To: rachel_nguyen@example.sg Date: Mon, 3 Feb 2025 18:12:09 +0800 Subject: Your refund for order CS-39485712 is on its way Message-ID: <20250203101209.7744.refund@curiositystream.com> Hi Rachel, A refund of SGD 9.99 has been issued to your Visa •••• 9910 for your January monthly charge. Expect it to appear on your statement within 5-7 business days. If something wasn’t right, please tell us—your feedback helps improve our service. Kind regards, CuriosityStream Billing

Subscription Paused (User Request) From: CuriosityStream <noreply@curiositystream.com> To: diego.martinez@example.mx Date: Sat, 5 Apr 2025 09:01:44 -0600 Subject: Your plan is paused—come back anytime! Message-ID: <20250405150144.8899.pause@curiositystream.com> Hola Diego, We’ve paused your Monthly HD Plan as requested. No future charges will occur until you reactivate. To restart: Sign in → Account > Resume Subscription. We’ll save your profiles and watch history for 24 months. Hasta luego, CuriosityStream

Account Reactivation Confirmation From: CuriosityStream <support@curiositystream.com> To: diego.martinez@example.mx Date: Wed, 24 Jul 2025 10:20:07 -0600 Subject: Welcome back—your CuriosityStream adventure continues! Message-ID: <20250724162007.9988.resume@curiositystream.com> Diego, Your subscription has been reactivated. Your next charge of MXN 99 will occur on 24 Aug 2025. Explore our “Space Race” collection—brand-new episodes just released. Enjoy! CuriosityStream Team

Terms of Use Update (contractual) From: CuriosityStream <legal@curiositystream.com> To: all-members@curiositystream.com Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025 22:15:22 +0000 Subject: We’re updating our Terms of Use—effective 7 Apr 2025 Message-ID: <20250307221522.1122.tos@curiositystream.com> Dear Member, We’re making some improvements to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, including: • Clearer descriptions of how we process payments • Added information on downloadable content limits • Updated dispute-resolution procedures The updated terms take effect 7 Apr 2025. Continuing to use CuriosityStream after that date means you accept the new terms. Read the full policies → https://curiositystream.com/terms Thank you for being curious, CuriosityStream Legal

Promotional Add-On (Bundle Offer) From: CuriosityStream <promotions@curiositystream.com> To: lara.patel@example.uk Date: Mon, 29 Sep 2025 09:40:19 +0100 Subject: Add Nebula for just $1/mo—limited-time partner offer Message-ID: <20250929084019.4466.bundle@curiositystream.com> Hi Lara, For a limited time, bundle Nebula—the creator-owned streaming service—with your CuriosityStream plan for only $1 per month for the first year. Click here to upgrade → Account > Add-Ons (offer ends 12 Oct 2025). Happy learning, CuriosityStream Partnerships

Invoice PDF (Annual Renewal) From: CuriosityStream <invoices@curiositystream.com> To: ming.lee@example.kr Date: Tue, 18 Feb 2025 17:55:08 +0900 Subject: Your CuriosityStream invoice—Annual 4K Plan Message-ID: <20250218085508.6677.invoice@curiositystream.com> Attachments: invoice-CS-2025-02-18-4K-PLN.pdf (231 KB) Hello Ming, Please find your invoice attached for the 4K Annual Plan renewal on 18 Feb 2025. • Amount: KRW 83 900 (VAT included) • Transaction ID: CS-TXN-20250218-33445566 • Next renewal: 18 Feb 2026 If you have any billing questions, simply reply to this email. Best regards, CuriosityStream Finance

Free-Trial Activation From: CuriosityStream <welcome@curiositystream.com> To: nora.jensen@example.dk Date: Thu, 10 Apr 2025 11:12:51 +0200 Subject: Your 7-day CuriosityStream trial has begun—start exploring! Message-ID: <20250410091251.1600.trial@curiositystream.com> Hej Nora, Your free trial is live from 10 Apr 2025 until 17 Apr 2025. After the trial, your card (Visa •••• 3404) will be billed DKK 49 per month unless you cancel. See what’s trending → https://curiositystream.com/home Happy watching! CuriosityStream Team

Trial Ending Reminder (48 h) From: CuriosityStream <alerts@curiositystream.com> To: nora.jensen@example.dk Date: Tue, 15 Apr 2025 11:15:22 +0200 Subject: Nora, your CuriosityStream trial ends in 48 hours Message-ID: <20250415091522.1600.trialend@curiositystream.com> Hi Nora, Just a quick reminder—your free trial finishes on 17 Apr 2025. No action needed if you’d like to keep streaming; we’ll charge DKK 49/month. To cancel: Account → Subscription → Cancel. Questions? We’re here 24/7. —CuriosityStream Support

Annual Renewal Receipt with Tax Breakdown From: CuriosityStream <receipts@curiositystream.com> To: leo.perez@example.es Date: Mon, 19 May 2025 05:07:04 +0000 Subject: Payment confirmation—Annual HD Plan renewal Message-ID: <20250519050704.2170.renew@curiositystream.com> Hola Leo, We’ve processed your annual renewal: • Plan: HD Annual • Amount: €29.99 • VAT (21 %): €6.30 • Total charged: €36.29 • Transaction ID: CS-20250519-761122 PDF invoice attached for your records. ¡Gracias por seguir aprendiendo! CuriosityStream Finanzas

From: CuriosityStream <billing@curiositystream.com> To: suzanne@sample.ca Date: Wed, 4 Jun 2025 18:42:19 -0400 Subject: Your plan price is changing on 5 Jul 2025 Message-ID: <20250604224219.3307.price@curiositystream.com> Hi Suzanne, To continue investing in new documentaries, your HD Monthly rate will change from CAD 4.99 to CAD 5.99 on 5 Jul 2025. No action is needed—your existing payment method will be billed at the new price. If you’d rather cancel, visit Account › Subscription before the next bill date. Thank you for your support, CuriosityStream

Regional Tax Rate Change From: CuriosityStream <legal@curiositystream.com> To: pierre.martin@example.fr Date: Wed, 4 Jun 2025 08:30:11 +0200 Subject: Update: new VAT rate on your subscription Message-ID: <20250604063011.2121.tax@curiositystream.com> Bonjour Pierre, French VAT on digital subscriptions will rise from 20 % to 21 % effective 1 Jul 2025. Your base price remains €3.99; tax will adjust automatically on your July bill. Full details: https://curiositystream.com/vat-update-2025 Merci, CuriosityStream Compliance

Payment Method Added Confirmation From: CuriosityStream <security@curiositystream.com> To: lucy.dawson@protonmail.com Date: Sun, 8 Jun 2025 17:14:03 +0000 Subject: New payment method saved to your account Message-ID: <20250608171403.2222.card-add@curiositystream.com> Hi Lucy, Mastercard •••• 1134 ending 04/28 was just added to your CuriosityStream wallet. If you didn’t add this card, please reset your password and contact support immediately. —Account Security

Autopay Method Switched to PayPal From: CuriosityStream <billing@curiositystream.com> To: lucy.dawson@protonmail.com Date: Mon, 9 Jun 2025 00:01:22 +0000 Subject: You’re all set—PayPal will handle future payments Message-ID: <20250609000122.2323.pp-switch@curiositystream.com> Hi Lucy, You’ve chosen PayPal (Primary) for automatic billing. Your next charge on 8 Jul 2025 will use PayPal order CS-PP-2025-06-09. No further steps required. Thanks for staying curious! CuriosityStream Billing

Family-Profile Invite Sent From: CuriosityStream <family@curiositystream.com> To: michelle.choi@gmail.com Date: Wed, 18 Jun 2025 12:40:55 -0700 Subject: Your invitation to join Daniel’s CuriosityStream plan Message-ID: <20250618194055.2424.invite@curiositystream.com> Hi Michelle, Daniel Choi (daniel.choi@example.com) has added you as a Family Member on his 4K Annual plan. Click “Accept Invitation” to set up your profile and start streaming: https://curiositystream.com/accept?token=JK3f8uP Happy viewing! CuriosityStream

Final Payment Attempt (72 h notice) From: CuriosityStream <alerts@curiositystream.com> To: priya.r@example.co.in Date: Thu, 26 Jun 2025 04:02:59 +0530 Subject: Final attempt in 72 hours—update payment now to avoid suspension Message-ID: <20250625223259.2525.final@curiositystream.com> Hi Priya, Our second retry on 25 Jun 2025 for ₹499 failed. We’ll make a final attempt on 28 Jun 2025. Update or replace card •••• 4510 at https://curiositystream.com/billing to keep your documentaries flowing. Need help? Reply to this email. —CuriosityStream Billing Support

Account Suspension Notice From: CuriosityStream <noreply@curiositystream.com> To: priya.r@example.co.in Date: Sun, 29 Jun 2025 00:15:20 +0530 Subject: Streaming paused—payment required to resume Message-ID: <20250628204520.2626.suspend@curiositystream.com> Hello Priya, We couldn’t process your final payment attempt on 28 Jun 2025. Your subscription is now suspended. Reactivate any time by adding a valid payment method. We’ll keep your watch history for 90 days. —CuriosityStream

Reactivation After Payment From: CuriosityStream <support@curiositystream.com> To: priya.r@example.co.in Date: Tue, 1 Jul 2025 11:44:07 +0530 Subject: Welcome back—your access has been restored Message-ID: <20250701111407.2727.resume@curiositystream.com> Hi Priya, Thanks for updating your payment info! Your HD Monthly plan is active again. Next charge: 1 Aug 2025. Dive into “India From Above”—now streaming in HD. Enjoy! CuriosityStream Team

Promotional Upgrade – Smart Bundle From: CuriosityStream <promotions@curiositystream.com> To: leonardo.silva@uol.com.br Date: Wed, 16 Jul 2025 13:02:18 -0300 Subject: Upgrade to the Smart Bundle—save 50 % on Nebula + CuriosityStream Message-ID: <20250716160218.2828.bundle@curiositystream.com> Olá Leonardo, For this week only, add Nebula to your CuriosityStream plan for R$2.99 / mês (50 % off). Cancel anytime. Redeem code: NEB50BR Expires: 23 Jul 2025 Aproveite! CuriosityStream Parcerias

Year-End Statement for Tax Purposes From: CuriosityStream <invoices@curiositystream.com> To: angela.ross@company.co.uk Date: Fri, 2 Jan 2026 09:00:00 +0000 Subject: Your 2025 subscription summary (PDF attached) Message-ID: <20260102090000.2929.statement@curiositystream.com> Hi Angela, Attached is a consolidated statement listing all CuriosityStream charges and VAT paid during the 2025 tax year. Questions? Email finance@curiositystream.com. Best regards, CuriosityStream Finance

Gift Plan Auto-Renewal Reminder From: CuriosityStream <gifts@curiositystream.com> To: kevin.doe@samplemail.com Date: Sun, 9 Nov 2025 08:20:44 -0500 Subject: Your gift for Sarah renews on 9 Dec—change or cancel anytime Message-ID: <20251109132044.3030.gift-renew@curiositystream.com> Hi Kevin, The gift subscription you purchased for sarah.brown@samplemail.com will renew on 9 Dec 2025 for US $39.99. Want to cancel auto-renew? Visit Gifts › Manage before 8 Dec 2025. Thanks for sharing curiosity! —CuriosityStream Gifts Team

Downgrade Confirmation (4K → HD) From: CuriosityStream <support@curiositystream.com> To: brian.taylor@icloud.com Date: Mon, 15 Dec 2025 15:55:12 -0500 Subject: Your plan has been changed to HD Monthly Message-ID: <20251215205512.3131.downgrade@curiositystream.com> Hi Brian, As requested, you’ve switched from 4K Monthly (US $9.99) to HD Monthly (US $4.99). The change takes effect on 15 Jan 2026 at the next billing cycle. Pro-rated credit of US $2.50 will be applied. Let us know if you change your mind—upgrades are instant! Cheers, CuriosityStream Support
